testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Assignment with Question Style 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I create question "CSS Question" with label "CSS Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the assignment question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I click the "Feedback" button in the toolbar
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then I see the feedback editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I enter "Feedback" in the feedback editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I click the "Custom CSS" button in the toolbar
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then I see the CSS editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I enter "body { background-color: red; }" in the CSS editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "CSS Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Assignment with Question Style 2" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I Turn on Mouse Visualization
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I launch the "Assignment with Question Style 2" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I confirm to submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And quit and save the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I select in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I select "Other users with grades" in "List" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I put "qa" in the "User" input box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I select "Best" in "Results" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I select "Completed" in "Progress" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: When I click the grade for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: Then I see the test record details of "Assignment with Question Style 2" for user "qa"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I see that the question background color is "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I see that the feedback background color is "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: And I do not see that the response background color is "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify Custom CSS is applied to question text and feedback in the gradebook
